artist: Manufacturer: Avon Tin; Designer: Elizabeth Greene
description: rectangular bank with grey detachable lid; bank painted to look like White House with grass, trees and shrubs included
inscription:
Inscription

on bottom, in black: [Made in England by Avon Tin of Bristol / For / Jack Cassidy & Associates Inc. U.S.A. / Registered Graphic Design by Elizabeth Greene / The White House Washington, D.C.]
title: "White House" still bank
